articles.description: FTSE 100 rises along with leading indices in Europe as stocks rebound.
articles.content:
In London, the FTSE 100 rose 0.4% after opening, undoing some of the losses on Monday sparked by housebuilders. Photo: Thomas Krych/SOPA/LightRocket via Getty

articles.title: Federal Reserve Vice Chair Richard Clarida Becomes Third to Resign After Trading Scandal - Newsweek
articles.description: Clarida's resignation announcement came after new information was revealed regarding his trading in a stock fund in February 2020.
articles.content:
Federal Reserve Vice Chair Richard Clarida has become the third Fed official to resign after a trading scandal at the central bank.

articles.title: US greenhouse emissions increased by 6.2 percent last year - Engadget

articles.title: Home COVID tests to be covered by insurers starting Saturday - KPRC Click2Houston
